org.ServerGui.Controller

Class ConfigSceneController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ServerGui.Controller.AbstractSceneController
      • org.ServerGui.Controller.ConfigSceneController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class ConfigSceneController
extends AbstractSceneController

    Controller for scene Config. Used to display a specific game's configuration.
